channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Elementor – Header, Footer & Blocks Template
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Elementor – Header, Footer & Blocks Template

item.title: CVE-2021-24256|2024-08-03T19:28:22.736Z -- unknown -- elementor%20%E2%80%93%20header%2C%20footer%20%26%20blocks%20template
item.description: The “Elementor – Header, Footer & Blocks Template” WordPress Plugin before 1.5.8 has two widgets that are vulnerable to stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) by lower-privileged users such as contributors, all via a similar method.
